name: Yoidore Set
description:
Indulge in our curated tasting experience featuring five delicious appetizers perfectly paired with premium Osaka-brewed beer and sake. This celebratory set showcases the finest local flavors:
• Artisanal ham crafted from Osaka Agricultural High School’s specialty “Nogei Pork”
• Pickled seasonal vegetables from local farms
• Thinly-sliced chashu (braised pork) carpaccio
• Our famous creamy egg potato salad with runny yolks and house-made miso mayo
• “Shin” fermented fried chicken with onion koji and fresh garlic

This exquisite selection comes paired with your choice of award-winning Minoh Beer or premium Akishika sake. The perfect way to elevate your Mitsukabōzu dining experience while supporting local producers.

name: Choi-Nomi Set
description:
Enjoy a casual drinking experience with our staff-selected appetizer paired with your choice of one premium beverage. This perfect light refreshment option allows you to sample our quality drinks without committing to a full set.

Choose one drink from our carefully curated selection:
• Award-winning Minoh Beer
• Premium Akishika sake
• Refreshing Akishika highball
• Marusan Wine (red or white)

Our knowledgeable staff will recommend the perfect small plate to complement your chosen beverage, creating a harmonious tasting experience. An ideal way to begin your meal or enjoy a quick visit to Mitsukabōzu.
